sentences: While ministers participated in the high-level panels on transfer of technology and mitigation, a group of 'Friends of the Presidency' met throughout the day and into the night trying to resolve outstanding issues.

Delegates leaving these rooms showed distress about the slow pace of negotiations on the post-2012 period and expressed concern at the clear endeavors by oil-producing countries and some non-Parties to the Protocol to wash down all attempts to address future actions and adaptation in an effort to protect their industries.
The longest faces were those of LDCs and small island States, who feel they have not been granted what they were seeking at this COP.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
